sub_title: Senior Associate @ De Brauw Blackstone Westbroek | Research Fellow @ Institute for Information Law (IViR), University of Amsterdam
summary:
Business-minded lawyer with extensive experience in privacy & data protection, international trade law, and legal research. My background in legal practice and academia allows me to provide business-oriented solutions to complex legal issues while keeping sight of how this solution fits into the overall business and compliance strategy.
Co-author of Contract Law in Russia, explaining Russian law to lawyers qualified in other jurisdictions.
